import axios from "axios" import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import '../styles/book.css' export default function Book(props) { const [book,setBook] = useState([]) axios.get(`https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/${props.bookId}`) .then((res)=>{ setBook(res.data.data) }) return (
Back

{book.title}

{book.artist_display}
{book.date_display}
{book.main_reference_number}
{book.dimensions}
) }
